Title: Kabuliwala
Writer: Premendra Mitra (additional dialogue), Tapan Sinha (screenplay), Rabindranath Tagore (story)
Actors: Chhabi Biswas, Oindrila Tagore, Radhamohan Bhattacharya, Manju Dey
Plot: Rahmat a middle-aged fruit seller from Afghanistan, comes to Calcutta to hawk his merchandise and befriends a small Bengali girl called Mini.
